remarks: The Hilbert lattice is relatively atomic.  Remark 2 of [Kalmbach] p. 149.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
chpssat.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
chpssat.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
chrelati $p |- ( A C. B -> E. x e. HAtoms ( A C. ( A vH x ) /\ ( A vH x ) C_ B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
